about_the_game:
UNDEFEATED: Genesis is a superhero action game where you can soar freely through the skies of an alien world and unleash awesome powers. You will take down giant enemies in huge, destructible environments using your incredible abilities. This is the ultimate superhero experience!

Story

You are an ordinary college student leading an unremarkable existence when you are struck by a meteor. You awaken on a mysterious planet where you discover you have been bestowed with incredible powers.



This planet once had a civilization far more advanced than Earth’s, but a massive explosive incident ravaged it centuries before, leaving it plagued by destructive mutants. Now you must stand up for the remaining survivors of this world and use your awesome powers to rid the planet of its violent and catastrophic blight.

The Team

We are Indie-us Games, an independent development studio of Unreal Engine professionals based in Osaka, Japan. We are big fans of superhero stories and we want to create an experience that makes you feel just as powerful as your favourite comic or manga heroes.


Our first project was UNDEFEATED, a 2019 superhero game developed by three students, which we released for free on Steam. After we gained experience in the video game industry we reunited at Indie-us Games to begin work on the sequel to UNDEFEATED...
UNDEFEATED: Genesis is that sequel! It will be the first title in a trilogy of Unreal Engine 5 games paying homage to superheroes while telling an expansive story.

Wishlist UNDEFEATED: Genesis now!

short_description: The ultimate superhero experience. Fly freely and unleash your awesome powers as you battle violent mutants to save an alien planet.
